translation:
By order that I received from Lord Vicente Paulo de Oliveira Vilas Boas, I instruct Your Honor, Sir,

Today the horses of Lord Pelúcio are departing, along with all those who have gathered to be able to follow the column that has not proceeded to this point due to a lack of horses; Your Honor,

In your rear, Your Honor, Lieutenant José Antônio, the good horses that he has sent to you.

I warn Your Honor, Your Honor,

The delay of the column is the arrival of these horses that are departing today, and as soon as they arrive, it will set out for this point; this will also be shown to Lord Your Honor, Your Honor.

Note well, Your Honor, Your Excellency.
